Fading Retreat.name: Fading Retreat
Fading Retreat.flavor: As your enemy closes in, you slip into the shadows and out of its sight.
Fading Retreat.trigger: An enemy you can see enters a square adjacent to you.
Fading Retreat.effect: You shift up to half your speed. If you have any cover or concealment at the end of this movement, you can make a Stealth check to hide, ignoring the penalty to the skill check for moving.
